alert.note: Alert for Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:11PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL LYCOMING AND SOUTH CENTRAL TIOGA COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 210 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southeast of Wellsboro, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ralston, Trout Run, Buttonwood and Liberty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for north central Pennsylvania.
